response.overview: In a time when two island tribes the peaceful Arawaks and the war-torn Caribs stand divided, a young idealist named Tack defies his father, the revered leader known as the Great Sun, and journeys to the rival island to help end the conflict. But when a plea for peace turns out to be a deadly trap, Tack must join forces with two fugitive sisters and risk everything to escape and protect his people from a looming war.
response.title: The Great Sun
